Post to Yammer from Azure Automation

February 20, 2015 - {"login"=>"adminian", "email"=>"ian.philpot@microsoft.com", "display_name"=>"adminian", "first_name"=>"", "last_name"=>""}

This little diddy pulls down the Azure Updates RSS feed, get's the last days posts (if there are any) and posts them to Yammer using email... Something to keep folks in our Yammer group informed.
